architecture.summary: Duda is a SaaS-based website builder that abstracts server management, utilizing Javascript for backend operations. It supports extensions through Javascript, HTML, and CSS, and offers managed hosting with RESTful API integrations.

targetUsers.summary: Duda caters primarily to single developers, small teams, and content editors, offering features suitable for small to medium-sized projects. While it provides tools for larger teams and enterprises, its capabilities are more aligned with smaller-scale operations.

legal.summary: Duda operates under a proprietary software license as a commercial entity, offering its platform through subscription-based plans.

userManagement.summary: Duda includes built-in user management, allowing administrators to manage team members and client permissions within the platform.

contentEditing.summary: Duda offers a drag-and-drop editor with on-site editing capabilities, supporting custom fields and content types. While it provides basic versioning and workflow features, real-time collaboration tools are limited.

contentDisplay.summary: Duda provides a variety of packaged themes through its marketplace, including paid options. Users can customize site displays without requiring frontend development expertise.

mobileSupport.summary: Duda ensures responsive design for optimal viewing across devices but does not natively support the creation of Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) or native mobile applications.

internationalization.summary: Duda supports multilingual content, user interface, and editor, facilitating website creation and management in multiple languages.

extensibility.summary: Duda offers an extension marketplace with both free and paid options, allowing users to enhance site functionality without requiring backend development skills.

commerce.summary: E-commerce functionality in Duda is available through extensions, notably integrating with platforms like Ecwid, and supports payment gateways such as PayPal, Stripe, and Square.

costs.summary: Duda operates on a subscription model, starting at $19 per month per site when billed annually, totaling approximately $228 for the first year. Higher-tier plans with additional features are available at increased subscription rates.
